entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog at times late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Fog at times in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 6 April 2023
